description:
Move up in the peloton without paying the carbon tax. Built on a light and stiff C1 aluminum frame the CAAD13 is quick and nimble. Outfitted with Shimano’s 105 groupset, you get to experience high-end performance without breaking the bank.

  • Smartform C1 premium alloy frame and carbon fork, with aggressive road bike geometry
  • SAVE™ Micro-suspension uses strategically engineered flex zones in the rear triangle to smooth out the ride
  • Shimano 105 hydraulic disc brakes keep velocity under control in even the worst weather
  • 2x11 drivetrain pairs 52-36T chain rings with an 11-30T cassette
  • Shimano 105 groupset with Shimano RS cranks
  • HollowGram 27 KNØT seatpost uses a flattened spine design for improved stiffness and power transfer
  • Vittoria Rubino Pro tires use Vittoria’s 3C rubber compound for great grip in the corners and a very low rolling resistance
  • Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for two years after purchase
  • Due to challenges with supply chain, components may be substituted for comparable parts at any time. The listed build is how MEC intended your bike to arrive, though the manufacturer may need to make a tweak or two to get you riding sooner
name: Cannondale CAAD13 105 Disc Bicycle - Unisex

specs.value: Cannondale Grip Bar Tape w/ gel
